description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Explore Thunder Moon's cavernous alien landscape by foot, with jetpacks and by vehicle in this sci-fi shooter adventure! Fight bosses, warp time, craft weapons, boost stats and items with powerups, place turrets, mine resources, build structures, and much more as the story unfolds in the vast world of Thunder Moon!
description.short: Explore Thunder Moon's cavernous alien landscape by foot, with jetpacks and by vehicle in this sci-fi shooter adventure!
